doc.field: Record Group 1. Governance, administration, and 3-School affairs (1888-2016; 64.42 linear feet)
Record Group 1. Governance, administration, and 3-School affairs (1888-2016; 64.42 linear feet)
Office of the Director of Related Programs and Campus Operations (16 folders)
Office of the Director of Related Programs and Campus Operations (16 folders)

Bulk of materials created 2011-2015. Most materials related to the rental of school facilities by outside groups. Some materials concern vendors providing services to the school, especially transportation. Types of materials include print matter from other institutions or vendors, correspondence (printed email), reports, and contracts. Also includes the 2014 International Program Emergency Response Manual.
Record Group 1. Governance, administration, and 3-School affairs (1888-2016; 64.42 linear feet)
